previewArticle.title: San Jose Earthquakes vs. Chivas USA | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: San Jose Earthquakes 1, Chivas USA 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: A pair of clubs looking to snap long winless skids meet in a vital Western Conference matchup as the San Jose Earthquakes play host to Chivas USA on Saturday evening at Buck Shaw Stadium. The Quakes are still looking for their first victory of 2014, coming off a scoreless draw at the Colorado Rapids. Chivas USA have gone winless in six games off a season-opening victory, their last match a 2-1 home loss to Seattle Sounders FC last Saturday.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: San Jose Earthquakes vs Chivas USA

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Bill Midd
timelineItems.text: More slipping in the box on the @1906Ultras end of the pitch. Rained yesterday. Shades of the Revs game slipping #SJvCHV #MLS #Quakes74

timelineItems.name: Jake Montero
timelineItems.text: 9' Yellow card SJ: Jordan Stewart. Looked liked he got a lot of the ball on a slide tackle, he thought so too. #Quakes74 #SJvCHV @sfbay

timelineItems.name: Jake Montero
timelineItems.text: Two yellows in 17 minutes for SJ. Gordon booked for challenge on Rosales. Rosales was also fouled on first yellow #Quakes74 #SJvCHV @sfbay

timelineItems.text: If @ChrisWondo nets a #SJvCHV winner. I will sing my #Wondo4Brazil song on the next #QA90 #quakes74 podcast. Sorry @philthisisphil #MLS

timelineItems.name: Vignesh Venkat
timelineItems.text: First win of the season! #COYQ

timelineItems.name: Frank Stranzl
timelineItems.text: Final whistle. @SJEarthquakes pick up win No. 1 thanks to a golazo from Yannick Djalo. Next up: Vancouver #Quakes74 #SJvCHV

timelineItems.name: $on!@
timelineItems.text: Oh boo. That was one of #ChivasUSA best chances to get 3 points. Doesn't get much easier than the #SJQuakes.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Argh. Another case of improvement with no result to show for it. Man this game is frustrating sometimes. #ChivasUSA #sjvchv #Quakes74.

timelineItems.name: Andrew V Watson
timelineItems.text: GAME OVER. Decent 1st half. SJ goal and DK red card made it almost impossible. Too cautious of a sub from Cabrera. #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Saturday night match between the San Jose Earthquakes and Chivas USA. Can San Jose find a spark in the attack? Will Erick Torres make it 7 goals in 8 games? Find out Saturday at 1030pm ET on MLS Live.
timelineItems.title: San Jose Earthquakes vs. Chivas USA April 26, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report
